title: Muppet Moments
overview: The shorts will feature the main Muppets cast (including Kermit the Frog, Miss Piggy, Fozzie Bear, Gonzo, Animal, Dr. Bunsen Honeydew, Beaker, Pepe the King Prawn, the Muppet Newsman, Bobo the Bear, Sam the Eagle, Rowlf the Dog, Bubba the Rat, Rizzo the Rat, Foo-Foo and Beauregard) interviewing real kids about various different things, such as apologies, favorite foods and manners.
